Nerangs.ab: vohū uxšiiā manaŋhā xšaϑrā aṣ̌ācā uštā tanūm sē bār guftan ka gāh ī rapihwin imā raōcā̊ barəzištəm barəzimanąm sē bār guftan ka gāh ī uzerin yaɱī spəṇtā ϑβā maińiiū uruuaēsē jasō sē bār guftan

"He has to recite three times vohū uxšiiā manaŋhā xšaϑrā aṣ̌ācā uštā tanūm. When it is the gāh rapihwin, he should recite three times imā raōcā̊ barəzištəm barəzimanąm. When it is the gāh uzerin, he should recite three times yaɱī spəṇtā ϑβā maińiiū uruuaēsē jasō."
Nerangs.a: [Unexpected instruction in the Vīdēvdād, since this liturgy is onlöy performed at ušahina-. Most likely all three texts were recited like in Yasna ī Nōg-Nāwar or Sīrōzag, see Y68.31]
